text: 5:4 Dɨboboniba 30:2; Godɨn Araziba 23:21-23; Onger Akaba 66:13-14; 76:11Egh nɨ akar dɨkɨrɨzɨ tamɨn God damighɨva, zuamɨram an gɨn mangɨ a damigh. Egh nɨ uan akar dɨkɨrɨzimɨn gɨn mangɨ damighan kogh, nɨ mati gumazir onganim. God kamaghɨn amir gumazamizibagh ifongezir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn nɨ akar dɨkɨrɨzim gami, egh nɨ an gɨn mangɨ a damigh.
